data.title: Advanced notice of Umicoreâ€™s 2023 Full Year Results
data.meta_description: Umicore will publish its 2023 full year results on February 16th, 2023 at 07:30 AM CET. The Group will host a webcast and conference call.
data.text:
Full Year 2023 earnings release

Time: 16 February 2024 at 07:30 AM CET

The press release on the 2023 Full Year results will be made available in the "Newsroom" section.

Presentation of the 2023 Full Year results: webcast and conference call

Time: 16 February 2024 at 08:30 AM CET

Umicore will conduct an analyst and investor webcast and conference call, during which Mathias Miedreich (CEO) and Wannes Peferoen (CFO) will comment on the 2023 full year results, including Q&A. It will only be possible to ask questions via the conference call. Presentation materials will be made available at the start of the call on our "Presentations" page.

Live Audio webcast

We recommend that participants join the webcast 5 minutes prior to the scheduled call. The transcript will be available shortly after the live webcast has ended. Press representatives are welcome to watch the live audio webcast. For further interpretation, they can contact the Media Relations team.

Access the audio webcast here

Conference call

Important: participants need to register upfront to receive the call-in details by email.

Please fill in the registration form upon which you will receive a confirmation email with the information to join the call (pin code and phone number per country). A reminder will be sent 15 minutes before event start time.

Register for the conference call
